addNetworks.title: Ɓeydu Rajooji
addNetworks.description: Doba butoŋ les ɗoo ngam ɓeydude Rajooji e wallet maa. Ɗum ina newna waylude hakkunde chains so aɗa ƴeewa.

convert.legacyTokenMissing: Legacy token alaa ngam chain o
convert.tigerOGMissing: TigerOG token alaa ngam chain o

networkWarning.title: Network Bonɗo
networkWarning.message: Waylude token ko dow BSC Chain tan waɗata.
networkWarning.description: Tiiɗno waylu fayde BSC Chain e wallet maa ngam waylude tokens, walla yahu to Pont tab ngam transfer tokens hakkunde chains.

bridge.historyStoredLocally: Daartol transactions ina reenaa e ngal kuutorgal

settings.title: Toɓɓe
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Hesɗitina RPC URL huutoraaɗo ngam kala chain nder nokkuure suɓaaɗe.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Alah chainji toɓɓaaɗi ngam nokkuure ndee.

login.title: A artii
login.subtitle: Naatana ngam jokkude to Freedom Bridge

banner.title: Hesɗii ɗoo?
banner.message: Janno Freedom Bridge e no mbaɗaa pont TigerOG tokens hakkunde chains.

hero.title: Yoofu <1/> <2>Galu</2> Maa
hero.subtitle: Pont TigerOG tokens e nder chains tawa alaa caɗeele, huutoraade Axelar Interchain Token Service. Ina reeni, ina yaawi, te alaa tax.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Freedom Bridge huutortoo Axelar ITS ngam addude experience bridging mo alaa njoɓdi, mo yamiraa, hakkunde {{count}}+ blockchains.

stopDecay.title: Haɗu Bonannde
stopDecay.description: Legacy tokens ina duppa 10-11% e value maa e kala coodgu e yeeygu. Waylude e TigerOG ina haɗa ɗum ɗoon e ɗoon, ina reena 100% e value maa.

conversion.title: 1:1 Waylude
conversion.description: Total supply waylataako. Tokens ina cokaa nder migration contract, te 1:1 equivalent ina waɗee. Alaa inflation, alaa dilution.

multichain.title: Multi-Chain
multichain.description: Deploy once, access everywhere. Asset maa ina wonta native interchain token e chains ina jeyaa heen Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, e ko nanndi heen.

security.title: Axelar Security
security.description: Axelar's decentralized network of validators wallitoo. ITS ina laaɓa wonde tokens maa ina transferaa no haanirta e kala networks.

cta.title: A hebijii ngam pontude?
cta.description: Naatu e interchain revolution. Ina ƴetta les minti ngam ñiiɓde assets maa e fuɗɗaade bridging via Axelar.

header.title: Binndanɗe
header.subtitle: Janno no ñiiɓirtaa legacy tokens, bridge hakkunde chains, e integrate e Freedom Bridge.

whatIs.title: Hol ko woni Freedom Bridge?
whatIs.content: Freedom Bridge ko decentralized bridging protocol mo feewnaa e Axelar's Interchain Token Service (ITS). Ina feewnaa ngam rimbinde tokens e single-chain limitations e high transaction taxes. So a ñiiɓii standard tokens nder interchain-compatible assets, users ina mbaawi dillinde value maɓɓe hakkunde blockchains tawaaɗi.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Legacy tokens ina keewi 10%+ taxes. TigerOG tokens ko 0% tax.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Dillin assets hakkunde {{count}}+ blockchains via Axelar.

howToConvert.title: No Waylirtaa Tokens
howToConvert.step1: Jokku wallet maa e source chain (e.g., BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Suɓo legacy token mo njiɗɗaa waylude.
howToConvert.step4: Approve Migration contract ngam spendude tokens maa.
howToConvert.step5: Doba Waylu ngam deposit legacy tokens maa te heɓaa equivalent amount of "TigerOG" tokens.
howToConvert.note: Tesko: Waylude ina adda legacy token's transaction tax (during the upgrade) so token maa ina ƴetta tax e transfers. Kono, so waylaama e TigerOG, kala transfers e bridges garooji alaa ɗum tax.

supportedNetworks.title: Networks Tawaaɗi
supportedNetworks.content: Freedom Bridge ina wallita ecosystem mawɗo {{count}}+ blockchains, ina newna seamless interoperability e nder EVM landscape via Axelar.

xerc20.title: Interchain Tokens
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) ina newna tokens deploy-eede e chains heewɗi e address gooto e unified supply management. Freedom Bridge ina huutoroo ITS ngam laaɓa wonde TigerOG ina heddii canonical asset kala ɗo pontaa.

axelar.title: Axelar Network
axelar.content: Min kuutortoo Axelar ngam interoperability layer amen. Axelar ko decentralized network mo newnata blockchains ceertuɗi jokkondirde, ina newna secure cross-chain communication e asset transfers. Axelar's security model ina pawaa e permissionless set of validators, ina rokka high-grade security ngam interchain tokens.

migration.title: Migration Logic
migration.content: Migration contract ko deployed e origin chain (e.g., BSC). Ina jogii original legacy tokens e custody. So a upgrade tokens, aɗa deposit nder Migration contract. So a unwrap (so ina woodi), aɗa burn TigerOG representation ngam release original tokens. Ɗum ina laaɓa wonde 1:1 peg ina woodi.

security.title: Security Model
security.content: Security ɓuri himmude. Min kuutortoo multi-layer security approach:
security.point1: Migration Architecture: Legacy tokens ina jogaa nder verified, immutable smart contracts.
security.point2: Axelar Validators: Cross-chain messages ina verify-ee e Axelar's decentralized network.
security.point3: Consistent Supply: ITS ina manage minting e burning ngam maintain constant total supply e kala chains.
security.point4: Audited Logic: Feewnaa e industry-standard Axelar e OpenZeppelin libraries.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Kala supply figures ina waawi verify-eede independently on-chain:

tigerogSupply.title: TigerOG Supply Breakdown
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG ina jogii fixed circulating supply derived daga BNBTiger token. Limoore ndee ina ƴeewa kala burned e permanently locked tokens.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens nelaaɗi e 0x000...dEaD ina burn-aa haa abada te mbaawaa heɓteede. Ɗum ina jeyaa heen tokens burned via original BNBTiger tax mechanism.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Limoore famarde e tokens ina stuck nder BNBTiger contract. Ɗii tokens mbaawaa heɓteede te ittiraama e circulation.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool ina jogii BNBTiger tokens paired e BNB. So LP tokens burn-aama (nelaa to dead address), underlying tokens nder pool ina lock-aa haa abada.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens burned: 86.18% e kala LP tokens
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ko ɗum waɗi, 86.18% e tokens nder LP ina locked haa abada
tigerogSupply.note: Tesko: TigerOG ina jogii 1:1 ratio e BNBTiger e sahaa migration. Circulating supply mo TigerOG ina foti e true circulating supply mo BNBTiger caggal nde burned e locked tokens ittaa.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Ɗii limoore limiraa ko e launch. Legacy BNBTiger token ina jokki e burn-ude tokens e kala buy/sell transaction, so actual circulating supply ina waawi lesɗude seeɗa e ko hollaa.

lionogSupply.title: LionOG Supply Breakdown
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG ina jogii fixed circulating supply derived daga BNBLion token. Limoore ndee ina ƴeewa kala burned e permanently locked tokens.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens nelaaɗi e 0x000...dEaD ina burn-aa haa abada te mbaawaa heɓteede. Ɗum ina jeyaa heen tokens burned via original BNBLion tax mechanism.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Limoore famarde e tokens ina stuck nder BNBLion contract. Ɗii tokens mbaawaa heɓteede te ittiraama e circulation.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool ina jogii BNBLion tokens paired e BNB. So LP tokens burn-aama (nelaa to dead address), underlying tokens nder pool ina lock-aa haa abada.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens burned: 99.98% e kala LP tokens
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ko ɗum waɗi, 99.98% e tokens nder LP ina locked haa abada
lionogSupply.note: Tesko: LionOG ina jogii 1:1 ratio e BNBLion e sahaa migration. Circulating supply mo LionOG ina foti e true circulating supply mo BNBLion caggal nde burned e locked tokens ittaa.
lionogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Ɗii limoore limiraa ko e launch. Legacy BNBLion token ina jokki e burn-ude tokens e kala buy/sell transaction, so actual circulating supply ina waawi lesɗude seeɗa e ko hollaa.

frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG ina jogii fixed circulating supply derived daga BNBFrog token. Limoore ndee ina ƴeewa kala burned e permanently locked tokens.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens nelaaɗi e 0x000...dEaD ina burn-aa haa abada te mbaawaa heɓteede. Ɗum ina jeyaa heen tokens burned via original BNBFrog tax mechanism.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Limoore famarde e tokens ina stuck nder BNBFrog contract. Ɗii tokens mbaawaa heɓteede te ittiraama e circulation.
frogogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool ina jogii BNBFrog tokens paired e BNB. So LP tokens burn-aama (nelaa to dead address), underlying tokens nder pool ina lock-aa haa abada.
frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens burned: 99.31% e kala LP tokens
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ko ɗum waɗi, 99.31% e tokens nder LP ina locked haa abada
frogogSupply.note: Tesko: FrogOG ina jogii 1:1 ratio e BNBFrog e sahaa migration. Circulating supply mo FrogOG ina foti e true circulating supply mo BNBFrog caggal nde burned e locked tokens ittaa.
frogogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Ɗii limoore limiraa ko e launch. Legacy BNBFrog token ina jokki e burn-ude tokens e kala buy/sell transaction, so actual circulating supply ina waawi lesɗude seeɗa e ko hollaa.

header.title: Kontooji Smart
header.subtitle: Adresiiji deployment laawɗuɗi ngam tokens e ponts e nder ecosystem Freedom Bridge.

faq.title: Wallitorde Freedom Bridge
faq.subtitle: Jaabawuuji e ɗii naamne ko faati e TigerOG, bridging, e Axelar.

cta.title: Aɗa jogii naamne goɗɗe?
cta.description: Naatu e community amen e Telegram walla ƴeew detailed Wiki ngam technical guides.

questions.q1: Hol ko woni faayiida waylude tokens am?
questions.a1: Waylude tokens maa e TigerOG ina momta transaction tax (ko ɓuri 10-12%) associated e legacy token. Ina newna maa kadi bridge ɗii tokens fayde blockchains goɗɗi hono Ethereum, Base, e ko nanndi heen via Axelar, ina newna access e ecosystem kesi.
questions.q2: Mbele ina laaɓi huutoraade Freedom Bridge?
questions.a2: Eey. Protocol o ina huutoroo secure Migration contract e Axelar's Interchain Token Service. So a waylii, BNBTiger maa ina burn-aa haa abada te a heɓa TigerOG e ratio 1:1. Burn mechanism o ina laaɓa wonde total supply ina manage-aa no haanirta e kala chains.
questions.a3: Freedom Bridge e hoore mum ƴettataa fee ngam waylude. A yoɓata tan ko standard blockchain gas fees. Bridging hakkunde chains ina adda cross-chain gas fee yoɓeteeɗo Axelar ngam cover relaying costs.
questions.q4: Ko waɗata so mi lalkii tokens am?
questions.a4: TigerOG tokens ina gollira hono kala ERC20 token goɗɗo. So a lalkii access e wallet maa, ɗi mbaawaa heɓteede. Kala sahaa reenu private keys maa e recovery phrases.
questions.q5: Mbele mi waawi waylude TigerOG tokens am fayde BNBTiger?
questions.a5: Alaa. Migration ko one-way conversion. So a waylii BNBTiger fayde TigerOG, tokens BNBTiger maa ina burn-aa haa abada (nelaa to dead address). Ɗum feewnaa nii — TigerOG ko upgraded, tax-free version mo foti replace-ude legacy token o fof.
questions.a6: Min mballitotoo multiple EVM chains via Axelar, ina jeyaa heen BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, e ko nanndi heen. Ƴeew Wiki ngam full list networks tawaaɗi.
questions.a7: Bridging speed ina pawaa e source chain's finality e Axelar's relaying. Ko ɓuri heewde, transfer hakkunde chains ina ƴetta 2-5 minti.
questions.q8: Hol ko woni circulating supplies e OG tokens?
questions.a8: Kala OG token ina jogii fixed circulating supply derived daga original BNB token, e nder ƴeewde burned tokens, stuck contract balances, e locked LP. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% e original). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% e original). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% e original). Ƴeew Wiki ngam breakdowns detailed e kala token.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Waylude network waɗaani. Jooɗɗo, waylu e wallet maaɗa.
